item.title: 125 Maryland Companies That Are the Fastest Growing in America
item.description: These companies from across Maryland earned a spot on the 2025 Inc. 5000 list, with a median three-year growth rate of 148 percent.

item.title: These 9 Words From a Therapist Cured My Midlife Blues
item.description: My birthday had me thinking about midlife regrets and roads not traveled. Then I read one simple sentence.

item.title: Nike Has a New Slogan, and It’s Coming for Gen Z’s Cringe Culture
item.description: After 37 years of ‘Just Do It,’ the brand is floating a new catchphrase aimed at Gen Z. CMO Nicole Graham explains how Nike landed on ‘Why do it.’

item.title: What to Know About the August Jobs Report
item.description: The labor market is calling for Fed rate cuts.

item.title: Neuroscience Says These 6 Minutes Can Increase Your Intelligence, Focus, and Decision-Making
item.description: Research shows a handful of minutes yield outsized cognitive benefits.
